org.apache.james.mailbox.hbase.mail

Class HBaseMessageMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailbox.store.transaction.NonTransactionalMapper
      • org.apache.james.mailbox.hbase.mail.HBaseMessageMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageMapper<UUID>, Mapper

    public class HBaseMessageMapper
extends NonTransactionalMapper
implements MessageMapper<UUID>
    HBase implementation of a MessageMapper. I don't know if this class is thread-safe! Asume it is not!

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.james.mailbox.store.mail.MessageMapper

      • findInMailbox

        public Iterator<Message<UUID>> findInMailbox(Mailbox<UUID> mailbox,
                                    MessageRange set,
                                    MessageMapper.FetchType fType,
                                    int max)
                                      throws MailboxException
        Description copied from interface: MessageMapper
        Return a Iterator which holds the messages for the given criterias The list must be ordered by the Message uid
        Specified by:
        findInMailbox in interface MessageMapper<UUID>
        Parameters:
        mailbox - The mailbox to search
        set - message range for batch processing
        max - the maximal limit of returned Message's. Use -1 to set no limit. In any case the caller MUST not expect the limit to get applied in all cases as the implementation MAY just ignore it
        Throws:
        MailboxException

      • add

        public MessageMetaData add(Mailbox<UUID> mailbox,
                  Message<UUID> message)
                    throws MailboxException
        Description copied from interface: MessageMapper
        Add the given Message to the underlying storage. Be aware that implementation may choose to replace the uid of the given message while storing. So you should only depend on the returned uid.
        Specified by:
        add in interface MessageMapper<UUID>
        Returns:
        uid
        Throws:
        MailboxException

                                   throws MailboxException
        Description copied from interface: MessageMapper
        Update flags for the given MessageRange. Only the flags may be modified after a message was saved to a mailbox.

      • copy

        public MessageMetaData copy(Mailbox<UUID> mailbox,
                   Message<UUID> original)
                     throws MailboxException
        Description copied from interface: MessageMapper
        Copy the given Message to a new mailbox and return the uid of the copy. Be aware that the given uid is just a suggestion for the uid of the copied message. Implementation may choose to use a different one, so only depend on the returned uid!
        Specified by:
        copy in interface MessageMapper<UUID>
        Parameters:
        mailbox - the Mailbox to copy to
        original - the original to copy
        Throws:
        MailboxException
